attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As of 19/01/2010 you have only responded to 4 out of the top 50 largest petitions. If this site is to be taken seriously then all the thousands of people signing these petitions deserve a response to at least the top 20 largest petitions.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
